body:
@ianlancetaylor Just checking, are those GC bits you provided for 386?  I'm not sure where to look for the authoritative bits, but by hand I came up with 50000ff5d31 (nibble by nibble; probably in memory it would be 05 00 f0 5f 3d 01) , and that's what I see in memory when I look in the right order:

    0x184d8ff5:	0x11	0xf3	0xfd	0xf5	0xff	0xff	0xf0	0xf0
    0x184d8ffd:	0xf0	0xf0	0x10

(except for the final byte which I'd expect to be 0xf5 or something).
